params._amount: amount of tokens to be withdrawn from treasury
amount of tokens to deposit to treasury
amount of tokens to be withdrawn from treasury

changeDepositStatus().notice: change status for user deposit. On or off

changeWithdrawalStatus().notice: change status for user deposit. On or off

chargeUser(address,string[],uint256[],ad.notice: charge user for one time charges

companyWithdraw(address,uint256).notice: company token withdrawal of one of the accepted erc20 from the treasury

getTotalCharges(address).notice: Return total charges of all users for a token

getTotalDeposit(address).notice: Return total deposits of all users for a token

getTotalWithdraws(address).notice: Return total withdrawals of all users for a token

userDeposit(address,uint256).notice: deposit one of the accepted erc20 to the treasury

userWithdraw(address,uint256).notice: user token withdrawal one of the accepted erc20 to the treasury
